name: Assorted Friendship
overview: Assorted Friendship is a coming-of-age adventure starring a school girl named Kanako attracted to her female friend. The gameplay follows the Japanese adventure format, with commands such as Look and Talk appearing during most scenes, with other context-specific actions popping up from time to time. There are no object sub-menus and the plot will usually advance after only a few commands have been selecting. There are also a few optional scenes and paths to take in the game.
